name: fuzzy-search
label: Fuzzy Search
description: Connector provides actions to search fuzzy word in string.

operations.title: Filter JSON by Key Value
operations.description: Filters JSON as per provided key value pair in JSON.

parameters.title: Input JSON
parameters.name: inputJSON
parameters.tooltip: Specify list of JSON or JSON to filter data.
parameters.description: Specify list of JSON or JSON to filter data.

parameters.title: Target Key Value
parameters.name: targetKeyValue
parameters.tooltip: Specify target key values pair for JSON data filtering.
parameters.description: Specify target key values pair for JSON data filtering.

parameters.title: Similarity Threshold
parameters.name: similarityThreshold
parameters.tooltip: Specify the similarity threshold (percentage) to match key value data in JSON.
parameters.description: Specify the similarity threshold (percentage) to match key value data in JSON.

parameters.title: Fuzzy Match
parameters.name: fuzzyMatch
parameters.tooltip: Check to filter data for fuzzy format.
parameters.description: Check to filter data for fuzzy format.

true.name: cutoff
true.title: Cut Off
true.description: Specify Cut Off (percentage) to filter data for Fuzzy Match.
true.tooltip: Specify Cut Off (percentage) to filter data for Fuzzy Match.

operations.title: Search Keyword In Text
operations.description: Searches specified fuzzy keyword in text

parameters.title: Input Text
parameters.name: inputText
parameters.tooltip: Specify text to search keyword in.
parameters.description: Specify text to search keyword in.

parameters.title: Keyword To Search
parameters.name: keywordToSearch
parameters.tooltip: Specify keyword or list of keywords to search in input text.
parameters.description: Specify keyword or list of keywords to search in input text.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify limit to get occurrence of keyword in input text.
parameters.description: Specify limit to get occurrence of keyword in input text.

parameters.title: Cut Off
parameters.name: cutoff
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Cut Off (percentage) to filter data for Fuzzy Match.
parameters.description: Specify the Cut Off (percentage) to filter data for Fuzzy Match.
